Export.Routine:
INSTAVERK(YART,AUFART,ANTAGE,ANEU,AALT,AANZ,EK,VDAT,BDAT,WG) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ARTIKELVERKAUF DES JAHRES ; ; Inputs : ; YART ARTIKEL ; AUFART AUFTRAGSART WENN "" DANN NUR KUNDENAUFTRÄGE; WENN "99" dann alle ; ANTAGE ANZAHL DER TAGE DIE IN DIE VERGANGENHEIT ZURÜCKGEGANGEN WIRD ; ANEU SUCHEN IN AKTUELLEN AUFTRÄGEN "" KEINE PRUEFUNG 0 = NICHT SUCHEN ; AALT SUCHEN IN ALTEN AUFTRÄGEN "" KEINE PRUEFUNG 0 = NICHT SUCHEN ; AANZ ANZAHL DER AUFTRÄGE, DIE MAX. ANGEZEIGT WERDEN SOLLEN ; EK ANZEIGEN EINKAUFSPREIS ; VDAT VON DATUM ;From Date ; BDAT BIS DATUM ;To Date ; WG WARENGRUPPE ; ; ByRef : ; ; Returns : ; ; History : ; 29-Sep-2006 GRF Naked references; doco; quits ; 21.11.2001 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YVON,YBIS,YI,DAT,SUM,ACCESS,AUF,POS,KUNDE,SUM,TAGE,ANZ SET WG=$GET(WG) SET AUFART=+$GET(AUFART) ;AUFTRAGSART ;IF $GET(YART)="" DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32292)) QUIT ;BITTE PRÜFEN IF $GET(YART)="" SET YART="" SET YART=$TRANSLATE(YART,",",";") ;IF $PIECE(YART,";",1)="" DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32292)) QUIT ;BITTE PRÜFEN SET YBIS=+$HOROLOG SET TAGE=$GET(ANTAGE) IF TAGE="" SET TAGE=+$PIECE($GET(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)),Y,88) ;ANZAHL DER TAGE FÜR UMSÄTZE ;Number the to IF TAGE=0 SET TAGE=364 ;IF TAG=0 ANZEIG NUR HEUTE ;only today SET YVON=+$HOROLOG-TAGE SET AANZ=$GET(AANZ) ;MAX ANZAHL ;Number IF +AANZ=0 SET AANZ=999 SET EK=+$GET(EK) IF $GET(VDAT)'="" SET YVON=VDAT IF $GET(BDAT)'="" SET YBIS=BDAT SET YBACK="INART," SET YKEY=YART DO ^WWWBACK IF $GET(YART)'="" DO UEBER($$^WWWTEXT(32024)_" "_YART_" "_$PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,$PIECE(YART,";",1),1)),Y,1)_" ("_$$^WWWDATE(YVON)_" - "_$$^WWWDATE(YBIS)_")") DO ^WWWFRAME(2) DO KOPF2 SET ANZM=0 SET SUM=0 SET ANZ=0 SET YDDSATZ=1 SET ACCESS(1)=$$^WWWACCESS($PIECE($GET(^WWW001(0,"INAUF",1)),Y,2),$PIECE($GET(^WWW001(0,"INAUF",1)),Y,5)) SET ACCESS(2)=$$^WWWACCESS($PIECE($GET(^WWW001(0,"INKUNDE",1)),Y,2),$PIECE($GET(^WWW001(0,"INKUNDE",1)),Y,5)) SET YTARGET=$GET(YTARGET) ;SET YTARGET=$PIECE(YTARGET,"/",1) IF YTARGET="" SET YTARGET="FRAME2" SET YART(1)=YART FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(YART(1),";",YI)="" SET YART=$PIECE(YART(1),";",YI) SET DAT=$ORDER(^INAUFPs(YM,6,$$^WWWUMLAU(YART,1),$$^WWWUMLAU(YBIS))) FOR SET DAT=$ORDER(^INAUFPs(YM,6,$$^WWWUMLAU(YART,1),DAT),-1) QUIT:DAT="" QUIT:DATAANZ DO . SET AUF="" . FOR SET AUF=$ORDER(^INAUFPs(YM,6,$$^WWWUMLAU(YART,1),DAT,AUF)) QUIT:AUF="" DO . . IF $GET(ANEU)=0 IF $DATA(^INAUF1(YM,AUF)) QUIT ;NICHT IN AKTUELLEN ;Not within . . IF $GET(AALT)=0 IF '$DATA(^INAUF1(YM,AUF)) QUIT ;NICHT IN ALTEN AUFTRÄGEN ;Not within . . SET POS="" . . FOR SET POS=$ORDER(^INAUFPs(YM,6,$$^WWWUMLAU(YART,1),DAT,AUF,POS)) QUIT:POS="" DO . . . DO ANZEIGE . . . SET ANZ=ANZ+1 SET YART(1)=YART IF AUFART'=0 FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(YART(1),";",YI)="" SET YART=$PIECE(YART(1),";",YI) SET AUF="" FOR SET AUF=$ORDER(^INAUFPTs(YM,1,$$^WWWUMLAU(YART,1),AUF),-1) QUIT:AUF="" QUIT:ANZM>AANZ DO . IF $GET(ANEU)=0 IF $DATA(^INAUF1(YM,AUF)) QUIT ;NICHT IN AKTUELLEN ;Not within . IF $GET(AALT)=0 IF '$DATA(^INAUF1(YM,AUF)) QUIT ;NICHT IN ALTEN AUFTRÄGEN ;Not within . SET DAT=$PIECE($GET(^INAUF(YM,AUF,1)),Y,4) . QUIT:DAT>YBIS . QUIT:DAT" QUIT LEER(ZEILE,SPALTE,MAX) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ANZEIGE VON LEEREN ZEILEN UND SPALTEN ;Show And split ; ; Inputs: ; ZEILE ANZAHL VON ZEILEN ; SPALTEN ANZAHL VON SPALTEN ;Number split ; MAX ANZAHL VON ZEILEN ;Number ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YI,YII SET MAX = $GET(MAX) SET ZEILE = $GET(ZEILE) SET SPALTE = $GET(SPALTE) IF MAX'="" SET ZEILE=MAX-ZEILE QUIT:ZEILE<0 FOR YI=1:1:ZEILE DO . DO NL^WWWTAB . FOR YII=1:1:SPALTE DO . . DO NF^WWWTAB . . WRITE " " . . DO EF^WWWTAB . DO EL^WWWTAB QUIT ANZEIGE ;ANZEIGE DER EINZELAUFTRÄGE ;Show the ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; YFELD objINAUFP ; YFELD objINAUFPT ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ SET YFELD=$GET(^INAUFP(YM,AUF,POS,1)) IF $GET(TEIL)'="" DO . SET YFELD=$GET(^INAUFPT(YM,AUF,POS,TEIL,1)) . IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,39)'=0 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,39) ;AUSGERECHNETE MENGE ;quantity . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,45)'="" DO . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)=10 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,45)\60 ;Minutes . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)=11 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,45)\100 ;Industry-Minutes . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)=2 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,45)\3600 ;Hours QUIT:$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)<0 QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=0 IF AUFART'=99 QUIT:$PIECE($GET(^INAUF(YM,AUF,1)),Y,2)'=AUFART ;NUR AUFTRAGSART ;only QUIT:ANZM'" ;AUFTRAGSDATUM ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWDATE(DAT) WRITE " " WRITE "" ;AUFTRAG ;order ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" IF ACCESS(1)=1 DO . NEW YKEY,YFORM,YBACK,YFKEY . WRITE "" WRITE AUF_"-"_POS IF $GET(TEIL)'="" WRITE "-"_TEIL ;WENN TEILE ;when IF ACCESS(1)=1 WRITE "" WRITE " " WRITE "" ;KUNDE ;customer ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" SET KUNDE=$PIECE($GET(^INAUF(YM,AUF,1)),Y,1) IF KUNDE'="" DO . IF ACCESS(2)=1 DO . . NEW YKEY,YFORM,YBACK . . SET YBACK="" . . WRITE "" . . WRITE KUNDE . . WRITE " " . . WRITE $PIECE($GET(^INKUNDE(YM,KUNDE,1)),Y,8) . . WRITE ", " . . WRITE $PIECE($GET(^INKUNDE(YM,KUNDE,1)),Y,16) . . IF ACCESS(2)=1 WRITE "" IF (KUNDE="") && (ACCESS(2)=1) { WRITE $PIECE($GET(^INAUF(YM,AUF,1)),Y,13) } WRITE " " WRITE "" ;MENGE ;quantity ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5) WRITE " " ;IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)'="" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE(YFELD,Y,40),1)),Y,1) ;IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)="" IF $PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,YART,1)),Y,40)'="" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE($GET(^(1)),Y,40),1)),Y,1) IF $PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,YART,1)),Y,40)'="" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,YART,1)),Y,40),1)),Y,1) ; 29-Sep-2006 SET SUM=SUM+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5) WRITE " " WRITE "" ;EK-PREIS ;--------------------------------------- IF EK=1 DO . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . ; . ; FIXME : SR15107 : Use D109 Received quantity if non-null? . ; . IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)'=0 WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(($PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)/$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)),0,2,YWHR) . WRITE " " . WRITE "" ;PROJEKT ;scheme ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^INAUF(YM,AUF,1)),Y,8) WRITE " " WRITE "" ;CHARGENNUMMER ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE(YFELD,Y,197) WRITE " " WRITE "" ;SERIENNUMMER ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" DO . NEW SN,YI . SET SN="" . IF $DATA(^INWEAUFS(YM,AUF,POS)) DO . . NEW BET,LAP,WE,SN0 . . SET BET="" . . FOR SET BET=$ORDER(^INWEAUFS(YM,AUF,POS,BET)) QUIT:BET="" DO . . . SET LAP="" . . . FOR SET LAP=$ORDER(^INWEAUFS(YM,AUF,POS,BET,LAP)) QUIT:LAP="" DO . . . . SET WE="" . . . . FOR SET WE=$ORDER(^INWEAUFS(YM,AUF,POS,BET,LAP,WE)) QUIT:WE="" DO . . . . . SET SN0="" . . . . . FOR SET SN0=$ORDER(^INWEAUFS(YM,AUF,POS,BET,LAP,WE,SN0)) QUIT:SN0="" DO . . . . . . SET SN=SN_";"_SN0 . ; . IF $DATA(^INWEAUFALTS(YM,AUF,POS)) DO . . NEW BET,LAP,WE,SN0 . . SET BET="" . . FOR SET BET=$ORDER(^INWEAUFALTS(YM,AUF,POS,BET)) QUIT:BET="" DO . . . SET LAP="" . . . FOR SET LAP=$ORDER(^INWEAUFALTS(YM,AUF,POS,BET,LAP)) QUIT:LAP="" DO . . . . SET WE="" . . . . FOR SET WE=$ORDER(^INWEAUFALTS(YM,AUF,POS,BET,LAP,WE)) QUIT:WE="" DO . . . . . SET SN0="" . . . . . FOR SET SN0=$ORDER(^INWEAUFALTS(YM,AUF,POS,BET,LAP,WE,SN0)) QUIT:SN0="" DO . . . . . . SET SN=SN_";"_SN0 . ; . IF $TRANSLATE(SN,";")'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(SN,";",YI,999)="" IF $PIECE(SN,";",YI)'="" WRITE $PIECE(SN,";",YI) WRITE:$PIECE(SN,";",YI+1)'="" "
",YCR WRITE " " WRITE "" WRITE "",YCR SET YDDSATZ=YDDSATZ+1 QUIT SUMME ;SUMMENZEILE ;IF SUM'=0 DO ; FIXME : remove DO level? DO . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . ;IF SUM=0 WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(46) ;KEINE DATEN VORHANDEN . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . IF SUM'=0 WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(SUM,0,$LENGTH($PIECE(SUM,".",2)))_" " . IF $GET(YART)'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,YART,1)),Y,40)'="" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,YART,1)),Y,40),1)),Y,1) ; 29-Sep-2006 . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . IF EK=1 DO . . WRITE "" . . WRITE "" . . WRITE " " . . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE " " . WRITE "" QUIT KOPF2 ;KOPF ZEILE ;heading WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(124) ;DATUM ;Date WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32047) ;AUFTRAG ;order WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" DO . IF AUFART=0 WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32231) QUIT ;KUNDE ;customer . IF AUFART=2 WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32022) QUIT ;LIEFERANT ;supplier . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32231)_"/"_$$^WWWTEXT(32022) ;KUNDE/LIEFERANT WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(31407) ;MENGE ;quantum ;quantity WRITE " " WRITE "" IF EK=1 DO . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32281) ;NETTO-EK . WRITE " " . WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32733) ;PROJEKT ;scheme WRITE " " WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32115) ;CHARGENNUMMER WRITE " " WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32116) ;SERIENNUMMER WRITE " " WRITE "" WRITE YCR QUIT UEBER(TEXT) ;ÜBERSCHRIFT ;superscription WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE YCR WRITE "" WRITE $GET(TEXT) WRITE "" WRITE YCR WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE YCR WRITE "
" QUIT ;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK STARTS - quit stops further processing WRITE "" WRITE YCR WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE TEXT WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE YCR QUIT ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END
